solution_line_template: Sherry needs to make {num_batches} batches of banana bread to make enough loaves because {total_loaves_needed}/{loaves_per_batch}=<<{total_loaves_needed}/{loaves_per_batch}={num_batches}>>{num_batches}.
Therefore, Sherry needs {total_bananas_needed} bananas because there is {bananas_per_batch} banana in each batch.
